subject: re:Can't afford drugs you need
body:
Dear valued member.
MyCanadianPharmacy provides a wide range of pharmaceutical products. You will be surprised by the selection of products available. 
Your health and wellness is the main focus of our professional team and we are glad to offer you really top quality products. 
For more information click herehttp://spreadown.hk
Strict confidentiality guaranteed.Made safe, secure, and reliable purchasing from the comfort of your home.
Best regards,Esperanza Donovan
